targets.query: environment:prod AND "Row was updated or deleted by another transaction (or unsaved-value mapping was incorrect) : [com.alice.HotelUser#"

panels.title: Row was updated or deleted by another transaction

targets.query: environment:prod AND priority:ERROR AND (role:"web" OR role:"jobs") AND message:com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.*

targets.expr: min by(job)(100 - (sum by (job, instance)(increase(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum[1m])) * 100 / sum by (job, instance) (increase(process_cpu_seconds_total[1m]))))

list.name: jvm_memory_pool
list.query: G1 Eden Space,G1 Survivor Space,G1 Old Gen
